analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the proposed rule change, which will ONLY lead to corruption with government officials acting to support the interests of themselves, the President or other high-ranking officials, rather than putting the interests of the American people first and being impartial in the management of US funds.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule change, highlighting concerns about corruption and politicization of government positions, which aligns with the themes of politicization concerns.
